page.description: The %a5w% flag makes the text box behave like an editor for Alpha Five web pages (e.g. .a5w pages). The html tags are color coded. The text inside the <%a5w ... %> tags are interpreted as Xbasic and all of the bubble help and auto-complete for Xbasic works correctly.

section.example: dim txt as P dim txt.object as P txt.text = <<%a% <body> this is the body <%a5 'this is xbasic code dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customers") %> </body> %a% ui_dlg_box("",<<%dlg% [%A5W%.75,15txt]; %dlg%)
